message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, I propose a price of $120 for it. This includes not only the product itself but also a comprehensive 30-day warranty and free shipping. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget.

I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget. I'd be willing to pay $90 for it, which is still a fair price considering the value you're offering. I'd love to hear your thoughts on this.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, and I'm glad you're interested in our product. After careful consideration, I am willing to adjust my offer to accommodate your needs. I propose a price of $95 for the product, which includes the warranty and free shipping. I hope this revised offer better aligns with your financial situation while still providing you with a great deal on our premium item. Please let me know if this is acceptable.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to work with me. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase it, but I need to stay within my budget. I'd love to hear if you can meet me at this price or if we can discuss further.

I appreciate your continued interest in our product, Bob. After reviewing your offer, I am willing to consider it. I propose a final price of $90 for the product, which includes the warranty and free shipping. I believe this is a fair compromise given the value and quality of the item. I hope this meets your budgetary requirements. Please let me know if this revised offer works for you.
